mapper.select: select count(*) as listCnt from booking where booker = #{param1} and vdate >= now()
select count(*) as listCnt from booking where booker = #{param1} and vdate < now()

select a.book_id, b.spot_name, a.howmany, a.m_qty, a.total, a.vdate, d.time_name, a.msg from booking a, spot b, member c, vtime d where a.spot_code = b.spot_code and a.booker = c.userid and a.vtime = d.time_code and a.booker = #{param1} and a.vdate >= now() order by a.vdate desc, d.time_name desc, a.spot_code limit #{pagination.startList},#{pagination.listSize}
